articles.title: A hotel worker's 3-hour commute tells the story of LA's housing crisis and her strike - KPBS
articles.description: Long commutes are a key reason why LA hotel workers have been on rolling strikes since early July. And they have a unique solution for hotels to help them.
articles.content:
Brenda Mendoza was born and raised in Los Angeles' Koreatown, just a 10-minute drive from the upscale JW Marriott hotel where she's been working for 14 years.
